moves.1. e4: This is my favorite game of all time. Just watch.
moves.1... e5 2. Nf3 d6 3. Bb5+ Bd7 4. Nc3 Nf6: Oh no! I'm down 3 points! But wait...
moves.7. a4 Bc6 8. d4 Bxe4 9. dxe5 dxe5: 4 points! All is lost...or is it?
moves.10. Bg5: Must move the queen, of course...
moves.10... Qd6: GREAT MOVE, I thought he had seen my plan. Still, I tried once more to entice him...
moves.11. Nxe5 Qxe5: Now I'm 6 points down! How can I win!?...
